copyright: The data included in this document is from www.openstreetmap.org. The data is made available under ODbL.

@id.description: name that identifies a unique object

wikidata.description: link to the related wikidata object

landuse.description: describe the usage of the land

area.description: describe if the area do not have any physical boundary

alt_name.description: an alternative name for the park

short_name.description: a short name for the park

start_date.description: the opening date of the facility

amenity.description: this variable describe the facility present at the park

created_by.description: the person that created the facility in openstreetmap

old_name.description: the old name of the facility

barrier.description: indicate the type of barrier that limit the facility

tourism.description: indicate why this facility can be of particular interest for the tourist

wikipedia.description: the reference to the wikipedia page

ele.description: the elevation on the sea level

natural.description: describe the type of nature inside the boundary

sport.description: describe one or more sport that can be played in the facility

surface.description: type of surface in the park

leaf_type.description: describe the type of leave in the facility

baby.description: specify if the item is tag friendly

playground.description: describe the type of playground available

water.description: describe the type of water body

religion.description: the type of religion practice inside

place.description: indicate what sort of place it is

playground:basketswing.description: describe if the facility have a basketswing

playground:chain_ladder.description: describe if the facility have a chain ladder

playground:slide.description: describe if the facility have a slide

playground:swing.description: describe if the facility have a swing

opening_hours.description: the opening hours of the park

addr:city.description: the city component of the address

addr:housenumber.description: the house number component of the address

addr:postcode.description: the postal code component of the address

addr:street.description: the street component of the address

playground:aerialrotator.description: describe if the facility have an aerialrotator

playground:basketball_backboard.description: describe if a zone where play basketball is available

playground:exercise.description: describe if an equipment are for the exercise is present

playground:horizontal_bar.description: describe if an horizontal bar is present

playground:seesaw.description: describe if an seesaw is present

playground:tunnel_tube.description: describe if an tunnel tube is present

fireplace.description: say if in the place is available a fireplace

animal_excrements.description: indicate the presence of animal excrements

description:it.description: a description of the place in italian

landcover.description: describe the material at the surface of the earth

residential.description: indicate the type of residential area

foot.description: describe the access permission to the area by foot

playground:climbingframe.description: describe if a climbing frame is present

addr:place.description: the place component of the address

motor_vehicle.description: describe the legal restriction to access of motor vehicle

fixme.description: mark of an element that require updating of the information

picnic_table.description: describe if picnic table are available

contact:website.description: the website where contact the park operator

playground:multi_play.description: describe if a multiple usage surface is available

playground:sandpit.description: describe if a sandpit is present

dog.description: describe the access permission of dog to a certain area

addr:city:it.description: the place component of the address in Italian

addr:city:mhn.description: the city component of the address in Moeno

@relations.description: describes the commercial relations with other parks

min_age.description: describe the minimum age of the facility

playground:theme.description: describe the theme of the park

playground:skate_equipment.description: describe if the park is equipment to play with the skateboard

playground:teenshelter.description: describe if a teen shelter is available

playground:water.description: describe if a water playground is available

coordinates.description: array the points which compose the polygon
